original_text: Then she spake, saying, They were wont to speak in old time, saying, They shall surely ask counsel at Abel: and so they ended the matter.
korean_text: 여인이 말하여 이르되 옛 사람들이 흔히 말하기를 아벨에게 가서 물을 것이라 하고 그 일을 끝내었나이다

sentences.original_text: They were wont to speak in old time, saying,
They shall surely ask counsel at Abel:
and so they ended the matter.
